<ide_selection>The user selected the lines 5 to 19 from /home/sean/assessor/.env.example:
FRONTEND_PORT=7385

# PostgreSQL Configuration
POSTGRES_PORT=7386
POSTGRES_DB=redi_assessment
POSTGRES_USER=postgres
POSTGRES_PASSWORD=your_secure_password_here

# Kong API Gateway
KONG_HTTP_PORT=7387
KONG_HTTPS_PORT=7388

# Supabase Studio (Database Management UI)
STUDIO_PORT=7389


This may or may not be related to the current task.</ide_selection>
Start and test the containers for this application. Ensure the port mapping from .env.example is used.
Resolve any build issues identified. If working, tag and push to dockerhub (username medicalresponse, already logged in).

Then, conduct a comprehensive code review with agents examining front end, back end, brand compliance, security, specification/code standard compliance, workflow/user story and documentation. Compile recommendations and issues and use these to update the to-do list. Then engage ultrawork to resolve each item.
